parameters.description: Filter for meshProjects that have the meshPaymentMethod with given identifier assigned. Substitute Payment Methods on meshProjects are not considered! Use an empty or blank value to filter for meshProjects without an assigned meshPaymentMethod. (optional)

parameters.name: deletionState
parameters.description:
Filter for meshProjects with a certain deletion state. Possible values are: +
[ACTIVE] (default option) All meshProjects that are not deleted or submitted for deletion, +
[PENDING_DELETION] meshProjects which are in a state of deletion. It means the system is waiting for all tenants to be successfully deleted after all tenants are gone the project itself is deleted, +
[DELETED] meshProjects which are fully deleted now, keep in mind that the identifier is changed (a timestamp is appended) after deletion so you might not use this as an identifying property.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description:
Filter for meshTenants with a certain state. You can also filter for multiple states by providing the state parameter multiple times. Possible values are: +
[ACTIVE](default option) All meshTenants that are not deleted or submitted for deletion. +
[MARKED_FOR_DELETION] All meshTenants that are awaiting manual deletion approval or are pending deletion. +
[DELETED] All meshTenants that are successfully deleted in cloud platforms.

createdOn.description: The Building Block has been created at this <<data_types,date>> (e.g. `2020-12-22T09:37:43Z`).

kind.description: The type of mesh object being targeted. Supported values are: `meshWorkspace`, `meshTenant`, and `meshBuildingBlock`.

name.description:
An identifier or UUID that uniquely identifies the referenced meshObject. The required format depends on the `kind` of the target:
For kind `meshWorkspace`, use the workspace identifier.
For kind `meshTenant`, use the tenant UUID.
For kind `meshBuildingBlock`, use the building block UUID.

spec.description: All fields in this section describe the Communication.
